p: Methods: Twenty-four patients (M/F 17/7, mean age 61 years) with abdominal septic shock underwent BF (PMX and CRRT). PMX was undergone twice and CRRT was undergone for 5 days. The changes of PCT levels and other inflammatory mediators such as blood WBC counts, CRP levels and lactate levels during BF were measured for 5 days. Moreover, SOFA and survival rate 14 days after ICU admitted were measured.
